dmca.title: DEMAND TO CEASE AND DISIST
dmca.body:
DEMAND TO CEASE AND DISIST

To Whom It May Concern,

I am and have been the registrant of the fuckamerica.us internet domain name since May 19, 2002. This domain was locked by NeuStar, Inc. soon after the registration thereof and removed from the zone. This action, which I contended at the time and still contend violates my constitutionally protected right to freedom speech, was based on that registry
